page.title: 03Fakenham Infant School
page.content: {Teaching Staff:}Headteacher, Deputy Head and 7 Assistant Teachers. {Other Staff:}1 secretary, 2 welfare assistants, 3 cleaners, 3 cooks, 5 midday supervisors, 1 crossing patrol. The{School}is 6 years old and caters for children aged 5-7 years. There are 215 pupils who come from Fakenham, Dunton, Hempton, Pudding Norton, Pensthorpe and Toftrees. From the villages the pupils come to school by bus or taxi.{Mid-day Meals:}A set first course and choice of second course are provided, or children may bring a packed lunch.{Voluntary Help:} Parents and friends of the school help with practical subjects (cookery, handwork, sports, etc.) and supervise groups of children playing games or working with tape recorders.{Transfer: to Fakenham Junior School, Queen's Road, at 7 plus.
